name: Wasteland Commune
startIntroPart1: Workers of all Countries, unite! The revolution will continue, even though the human history has reached its lowest point. Capitalism, fashism, reactionary forces remains. Fight back! All at once!
defeated: The revolution wont die, as long as there are exploits, there will be revolt.
introduction: I'm Similova, I stand for the proletariat of this world, if you are not fashist scum, we could be allies.
hateHello: You are to be hanged on a street light, if you even have any.
tradeRequest: Trading materials is good for development, isn't it?
uniques: [Ranged] units gain the [Extended Range] promotion <after discovering [Rifling]>
[Military] units gain the [Forage] promotion <after discovering [Replaceable Parts]>

civilopediaText.text: Working men of all Countries, unite! The revolution will continue, even though the human history has reached its lowest point. Capitalism, fashism, reactionary forces remains. Fight back! All at once!
